post:
Howdy!

Permission to post taken from @ishaq

Cloudrino brings to you a Halloween treat on pure SSD openvz VMs. Here are the plan details:

1 GB RAM

20 GB SSD Storage

500 GB Bandwidth(50Mbit)

1 core

1 IPv4 

Price for first month: $0.99

Recurring Price: $5 per month

Available locations: Pune, India and Asheville, USA.

Signup Link:

https://www.cloudrino.net/signup/halloween.php

Have a magical halloween. :)

Cheers!
